title: is this braking the rules
body: ik a guy selling accs to people not naming him but is it braking the rules?

replies.body: Account sharing and selling is against the Terms of Use. If you wish to report it you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

it is, but if no one finds out, how can they stop you.
you risk the account getting banned tho.
